subject: Create tdd-tools plugin structure and marketplace registration
description:
Set up the new `tdd-tools` plugin directory structure and register it in the Agent Alchemy marketplace.

Create the directory layout:
```
claude/tdd-tools/
├── agents/
├── skills/
│   ├── generate-tests/
│   │   └── references/
│   ├── tdd-cycle/
│   │   └── references/
│   └── analyze-coverage/
│       └── references/
└── README.md
```

Create `plugin.json` manifest following existing plugin conventions (see `claude/core-tools/plugin.json` as reference). Plugin name: `agent-alchemy-tdd-tools`, version `0.1.0`.

Register in `claude/.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` following the existing registration pattern for `agent-alchemy-core-tools`, `agent-alchemy-dev-tools`, `agent-alchemy-sdd-tools`, and `agent-alchemy-git-tools`.

Create a README.md documenting the plugin's purpose: TDD tools for AI agents — test generation, RED-GREEN-REFACTOR workflows, and coverage analysis.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] Directory structure created matching the proposed layout in spec Section 13.3
- [ ] plugin.json manifest created with correct name, version, description
- [ ] Plugin registered in marketplace.json
- [ ] README.md created with plugin overview

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] Plugin structure follows exact conventions of existing plugins (core-tools, dev-tools, sdd-tools)
- [ ] No duplicate entries in marketplace.json

_Error Handling:_
- [ ] marketplace.json remains valid JSON after registration

**Testing Requirements:**
• Manual: Verify plugin structure matches existing plugin patterns
• Manual: Validate plugin.json and marketplace.json are well-formed

Source: specs/tdd-features-SPEC.md Section 7.1, 13.3
